name: Co To - the heaven of ocean in Viet Nam
description: Catching unspoilt beaches and feeling the fresh air together with bright sunshine and blue pure ocean, tasting fresh seafood and walking around the beaches, taking beautiful photos. don't miss Co To because there would be the destination for your best experience and a really nice trip. getting up early and cycling around, you will contemplate the amazing landscapes of ocean and also moutain. for more choise and unforgettable memories, tourists can try home-stay besides other modern facilities.Co To island looks like Boracay of Philipines. This is a must-see attraction of Vietnam, an ideal place to travel and relax. Co To’s rustic beauty has attracted a lot of young tourists in Vietnam who are seeking adventure and do not care much about hotels and services quality. Also, beauty of Halong Bay on the way to Co To island can’t be missed.
